title: Nobody - Official Trailer (HD)
description:
In Theaters Only March 26
https://www.nobody.movie

Sometimes the man you donâ€™t notice is the most dangerous of all. 

Emmy winner Bob Odenkirk (Better Call Saul, The Post, Nebraska) stars as Hutch Mansell, an underestimated and overlooked dad and husband, taking lifeâ€™s indignities on the chin and never pushing back. A nobody.  
When two thieves break into his suburban home one night, Hutch declines to defend himself or his family, hoping to prevent serious violence. His teenage son, Blake (Gage Munroe, The Shack), is disappointed in him and his wife, Becca (Connie Nielsen, Wonder Woman), seems to pull only further away.
 
The aftermath of the incident strikes a match to Hutchâ€™s long-simmering rage, triggering dormant instincts and propelling him on a brutal path that will surface dark secrets and lethal skills. In a barrage of fists, gunfire and squealing tires, Hutch must save his family from a dangerous adversary (famed Russian actor Aleksey Serebryakov, Amazonâ€™s McMafia)â€”and ensure that he will never be underestimated as a nobody again.

Nobody is directed by acclaimed filmmaker Ilya Naishuller (Hardcore Henry), from a script by Derek Kolstad, the narrative architect of the John Wick franchise, and co-stars legendary Emmy winner Christopher Lloyd as Hutchâ€™s father and multi-hyphenate musician-actor RZA as Hutchâ€™s brother, whose own hidden talents aid Hutch in his quest for vengeance.  

The film is produced by Kelly McCormick, p.g.a, and David Leitch, p.g.a., the filmmakers of Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw, Deadpool 2 and Atomic Blonde, for their company 87North, by Braden Aftergood, p.g.a. (Hell or High Water, Wind River), for his Eighty Two Films, and by Bob Odenkirk and Marc Provissiero (Huluâ€™s PEN15) for Odenkirk Provissiero Entertainment. The film is executive produced by Derek Kolstad, Marc S. Fischer, Annie Marter and Tobey Maguire.

title: THE UNHOLY - Official Trailer (HD) | Now Playing in Theaters
description:
When God builds a church, á›­he devil builds a chapel next door. ğŸ©¸ğŸ•Šá›­he #UnholyMovie is Now Playing in Theaters. http://bit.ly/UnholyTickets

Visit Site: http://theunholy.movie 

Follow THE UNHOLY On Social:
https://www.facebook.com/SonyPictures
https://www.twitter.com/UnholyMovie
https://www.instagram.com/UnholyMovie

Subscribe to Sony Pictures for exclusive content: http://bit.ly/SonyPicsSubscribe

The Unholy follows Alice, a young hearing-impaired girl who, after a supposed visitation from the Virgin Mary, is inexplicably able to hear, speak and heal the sick. As word spreads and people from near and far flock to witness her miracles, a disgraced journalist (Jeffrey Dean Morgan) hoping to revive his career visits the small New England town to investigate. When terrifying events begin to happen all around, he starts to question if these phenomena are the works of the Virgin Mary or something much more sinister. The Unholy is produced by Sam Raimi, Rob Tapert and Evan Spiliotopoulos, written for the screen and directed by Evan Spiliotopoulos, and is based upon James Herbertâ€™s best-selling book Shrine.

title: The Serpent | Official Trailer | Netflix
description:
What does it take to catch a killer?

Inspired by real events, The Serpent reveals the story of serial conman Charles Sobhraj (Golden Globe nominee Tahar Rahim) and the remarkable attempts to bring him to justice.

The Serpent. Coming to Netflix on April 2nd.

SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/29qBUt7

About Netflix:
Netflix is the world's leading streaming entertainment service with 204 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, documentaries and feature films across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can watch as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, on any internet-connected screen. Members can play, pause and resume watching, all without commercials or commitments.

The Serpent | Official Trailer | Netflix
https://youtube.com/Netflix

In the 1970s, merciless killer Charles Sobhraj preys on travelers exploring the "hippie trail" of South Asia. Based on shocking true events.

title: Disney's Cruella | Official Trailer
description:
Brilliant. Bad. A little bit mad. May 2021.

Academy AwardÂ® winner Emma Stone (â€œLa La Landâ€) stars in Disneyâ€™s â€œCruella,â€ an all-new live-action feature film about the rebellious early days of one of cinemas most notorious â€“ and notoriously fashionable â€“ villains, the legendary Cruella de Vil. â€œCruella,â€ which is set in 1970s London amidst the punk rock revolution, follows a young grifter named Estella, a clever and creative girl determined to make a name for herself with her designs. She befriends a pair of young thieves who appreciate her appetite for mischief, and together they are able to build a life for themselves on the London streets. One day, Estellaâ€™s flair for fashion catches the eye of the Baroness von Hellman, a fashion legend who is devastatingly chic and terrifyingly haute, played by two-time OscarÂ® winner Emma Thompson (â€œHowards End,â€ â€œSense & Sensibilityâ€). But their relationship sets in motion a course of events and revelations that will cause Estella to embrace her wicked side and become the raucous, fashionable and revenge-bent Cruella.
Â 
Disneyâ€™s â€œCruellaâ€ is directed by Craig Gillespie (â€œI Tonyaâ€) from a screenplay by Dana Fox and Tony McNamara, story by Aline Brosh McKenna and Kelly Marcel & Steve Zissis. It was produced by Andrew Gunn (â€œFreaky Fridayâ€), Marc Platt (â€œMary Poppins Returnsâ€) and Kristin Burr (â€œChristopher Robinâ€), with Emma Stone, Michelle Wright, Jared LeBoff and Glenn Close serving as executive producers. Two-time OscarÂ®- winning costume designer Jenny Beavan (â€œMad Max: Fury Road,â€ â€œA Room with a Viewâ€) creates the dazzling and imaginative costumes, which take on a life of their own.

For more information on â€œCruella,â€ follow us on:

title: Marvel Studios' Loki - Official Trailer 2 (2021) Tom Hiddleston, Owen Wilson
description:
Watch the new trailer for the upcoming Marvel series, Loki, which premieres on June 11 on Disney+.

Tom Hiddleston returns as the God of Mischief, Loki. The series, which takes place after the events of Avengers: Endgame, also stars Owen Wilson, Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Sophia Di Martino, Wunmi Mosaku, and Richard E. Grant.

#IGN #Loki

From Warner Bros. Pictures and Legendary Pictures comes the long-awaited face-off between two icons, â€œGodzilla vs. Kong,â€ the next epic adventure in Legendaryâ€™s cinematic Monsterverse, directed by Adam Wingard.

Legends collide in â€œGodzilla vs. Kongâ€ as these mythic adversaries meet in a spectacular battle for the ages, with the fate of the world hanging in the balance.  Kong and his protectors undertake a perilous journey to find his true home, and with them is Jia, a young orphaned girl with whom he has formed a unique and powerful bond.  But they unexpectedly find themselves in the path of an enraged Godzilla, cutting a swath of destruction across the globe.  The epic clash between the two titansâ€”instigated by unseen forcesâ€”is only the beginning of the mystery that lies deep within the core of the Earth.

The film stars Alexander SkarsgÃ¥rd (â€œBig Little Lies,â€ â€œThe Little Drummer Girlâ€), Millie Bobby Brown (â€œStranger Thingsâ€), Rebecca Hall (â€œChristine,â€ â€œProfessor Marston and the Wonder Womenâ€), Brian Tyree Henry (â€œJoker,â€ â€œSpider-Man: Into the Spider-Verseâ€), Shun Oguri (â€œWeathering with Youâ€), Eiza GonzÃ¡lez (â€œFast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shawâ€), Julian Dennison (â€œDeadpool 2â€), with Kyle Chandler (â€œGodzilla: King of the Monstersâ€) and DemiÃ¡n Bichir (â€œThe Nun,â€ â€œThe Hateful Eightâ€).
Wingard (â€œThe Guest,â€ â€œYouâ€™re Nextâ€) directed from a screenplay by Eric Pearson (â€œThor: Ragnarokâ€) and Max Borenstein (â€œGodzilla: King of the Monsters,â€ â€œKong: Skull Islandâ€), story by Terry Rossio (â€œPirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Talesâ€) and Michael Dougherty & Zach Shields (â€œGodzilla: King of the Monstersâ€), based on the character â€œGodzillaâ€ owned and created by TOHO CO., LTD.  The film was produced by Mary Parent, Alex Garcia, Eric McLeod, Jon Jashni, Thomas Tull and Brian Rogers, with Jay Ashenfelter, Herbert W. Gains, Dan Lin, Roy Lee, Yoshimitsu Banno and Kenji Okuhira executive producing.

The directorâ€™s behind-the-scenes creative team included director of photography Ben Seresin (â€œThe Mummy,â€ â€œWorld War Zâ€), production designers Owen Paterson (â€œJumanji: Welcome to the Jungle,â€ â€œGodzillaâ€) and Thomas S. Hammock (â€œBlair Witchâ€), editor Josh Schaeffer (â€œGodzilla: King of the Monstersâ€), costume designer Ann Foley (â€œSkyscraperâ€) and visual effects supervisor John â€œDJâ€ DesJardin (upcoming â€œZack Snyderâ€™s Justice Leagueâ€).

Warner Bros. Pictures and Legendary Pictures Present a Legendary Pictures Production, A Film By Adam Wingard, â€œGodzilla vs. Kong.â€  The film will be released nationwide in 2D and 3D in select theaters and IMAX on March 26, 2021 and will be available in the U.S. on HBO Max for 31 days from theatrical release.  It is rated PG-13 for intense sequences of creature violence/destruction and brief language.
